summary: SummaryDyson's iconic Supersonic™ Nural hair dryer, with added intelligence.
details: DetailsBenefitsProtects your scalp barrier from extreme heat, helping to maintain your scalp's moisture levels and hair's shineHelps prevent over drying for healthy looking and smooth hair¹Learns and remembers your styling routine and automatically adjusts to your go-to airflow and heat settings as you styleFive attachments engineered to style all hair typesFeaturesA new network of Nural™ sensors within the machine activate intelligent features automatically to optimize your styling routineScalp protect mode automatically adjusts air temperature to maintain an optimal target temperature of 130°F at the scalp for comfortable, close-up drying.²Attachment learning recognizes each attachment and remembers your styling preferences. Intelligent attachments automatically adjust to your preferred airflow and heat settings for easier styling.³Pause detect knows when you've paused styling. When no motion is detected, the machine will automatically switch off the heater and reduce airflow. When it’s picked back up, it’s reactivated.Capsule illumination changes color to indicate what heat setting you are in, so you always know how much heat you’re using. Clear endcap lets you see Dyson’s pioneering technology at work.Scalp protect button: When ON, automatically lowers heat when the machine is close to the scalp. When OFF, allows you to manually choose your heat setting.Three precise airflow settings: High for fast drying and styling, Medium for regular drying, Low for gentle drying and diffusingFour precise heat settings: 212°F for fast drying and styling 176°F for regular drying 140°F for gentle drying and diffusing 82°F constant cool to set your styleInstant control with 82°F cold shot to set your hair after stylingCaveats:¹When used in Scalp protect mode²In-use conditions may affect experience of pre-set temperature. Attachments compatible with Scalp protect mode: Gentle air attachment, Styling concentrator³Activating Scalp protect mode will override last-used heat settings⁴In Dome mode vs. diffuse mode⁵For use on dry and straight[ened] hairIncludesSupersonic Nural™ hair dryerWave+Curl diffuser is 2-in-1 diffuser: Dome mode draws air into the dome and infuses it through the hair to enhance natural waves or curls for a more defined finish.⁴ Diffuse mode gently disperses airflow through longer prongs for voluminous curls and coils.Gentle air attachment evenly diffuses airflow for fast, yet gentle styling in Scalp protect mode.Styling concentrator is re-engineered with a wider, thinner blade of air for precision styling. Compatible with Scalp protect mode.Wide-tooth comb shapes and lengthens curly and coily hair.Flyaway attachment finishes sleek, straight styles with Coanda airflow to hide flyaways.⁵Item 2638890How To Use• Start with clean, wet hair.• For a smooth look, use the Gentle air attachment in Scalp protect mode to rough dry roots before styling. Section hair and use the Styling concentrator and a round brush to style one section at a time. Once hair is dry, use Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish.• Enhance your natural curl pattern with two modes using the Wave+Curl diffuser. Separate the prongs from the center of the diffuser for Dome mode to create natural waves or use in Diffuse mode for textured curls.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: • Start with clean, wet hair.• For a smooth look, use the Gentle air attachment in Scalp protect mode to rough dry roots before styling. Section hair and use the Styling concentrator and a round brush to style one section at a time. Once hair is dry, use Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish.• Enhance your natural curl pattern with two modes using the Wave+Curl diffuser. Separate the prongs from the center of the diffuser for Dome mode to create natural waves or use in Diffuse mode for textured curls.

reviews.headline: Awesome!
reviews.comments: It's amazing! Just keep in mind that this color doesn't come in a box/case. I wish I'd paid attention before buying it.
